resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
We are trying to open a specific window when user tap on a push notification based on passed parameter.We tap on push notification when application is not running then we are able to open specific window but if application is running then on tap on push notification app comes to foreground from background but could not move to specific page.
Is there any way to achieve the same?
fields.summary: Open Specific window on tap of Push Notification in Andorid

comments.body:
Hello [~rtlechuga]

I have tested this with SDK 3.5.2.v20150310143218 and 4.0.0.Beta2. The above project is working. Just use "ti.cloudpush" version 3.3.7.
Thanks.
